tagline: 10% Vitamin C for Oily, Combination skin
benefits: Unveils a luminous, radiant complexion by evening out skin tone and banishing dullness for that coveted healthy glow
Visibly diminishes dark spots and hyperpigmentation over time, revealing clearer, more uniform skin you'll love to show off
usage_instructions: Cleanse your face thoroughly with a gentle cleanser and pat dry with a clean towel
Dispense 2-3 drops of the product onto your fingertips or palm
Warm the product between your fingers for a few seconds to aid absorption
Gently press and massage the product into your face and neck using upward, outward motions
Focus on areas of concern, ensuring even distribution across your entire face
Allow the product to fully absorb for 1-2 minutes before proceeding
Follow with your morning moisturizer if needed
Complete your morning routine by applying a broad-spectrum sunscreen with SPF 30 or higher as your final step
